Name: Thread Fred
About the game: Fred worked in a garment factory until an explosion occurred and he was thrown into the air. Flying past sharp rocks, strange creatures and watching beautiful views, Fred fights off enemies with balls of thread, and collects pieces of bread thrown to pigeons and dreams of a speedy and safe landing. Thread Fred-Side-Scroller Shooter, under your control is a flying man, you Dodge obstacles from above and below, maneuver between lightning strikes, destroy tangles of threads of evil vegetables and collect bonuses in the form of bread crusts. Features of the game: - PSYCHEDELIC! - Nice visual style - Dynamic music - The complexity
